Posts.Content: I spoke to one of the doctors about a year ago to see if I could get into the clinical trial. I couldn't due to my PSA being to low. It looks like they are onto something good lets hope. FIGHT ON http://finance.yahoo.com/news/cz-bio...150000557.html

Psa 1 month undetectable. 3 months undetectable. 7 months .5 CT scan, Bone scan and prosticint scan clean. EBRT May 2010. 39 sessions 70gy. On number 28.

Posts.Content: I am currently on triple blockade vacation. My psa at the time in May was .005. What is the chance they find bone mets in the scan.

Posts.Title: Nervous about bone scan

Posts.Content: I have been on triple blockade vacation now for the last 9 nonths after acheving a PSA of <.005. My lastest PSA shows a jump to .5. Dr. Lam suggests that we do the C11 scan. He feels by doing this that there is a 10% chance of a cure. The scan is about $3,000. I feel that at even a 10% chance is worth the money or should I restart triple blockade again. Any thoughts.

Posts.Title: C11 Scan

Posts.Content: I went through this clinical trial 5 years ago at the City of Hope. I to am a gleason 9 and had a low PSA of 4.7 at the time. Although the trial failed in my case. I have gone on to radiation which also failed. I am now on triples blockade. This is my second round after having a 8 month vacation. My current PSA is 0.23. I truly believe as does Dr. Lam that the clinical trial has helped me in the fight. Always FIGHT ON

Posts.Title: Husband with Gleason 9 at age 48

Posts.Content: Today marks my fifth year since I started the journey called PC. I am currently 2 1/2 years in to intermittent triple blockade. My current PSA is 0.018 and will have my second vacation from Lupron in May. I just want to say how great full I am. Since I started this journey I have seen 3 grandchildren born. This May I will get to walk my daughter down the isle. I wake up every morning to the most loving wife who knows that a kiss and a hug is still intimate. Yes I have side effects but to me it is worth it for the above reasons. Dr. Lam says he will get me to 70 and I told him then I will get me to 80. We both feel attitude plays a big roll in outcome. Not just in PC but in all areas. Thanks to all my brothers here who have consoled and given great advice. Keep fighting the good fight I plan on it. FIGHT ON

AgeInfo.Phrase: he will get me to 70 and I told him then
